scripts.build:all: npm run build:upload && npm run build:history && npm run build:glossary
scripts.build:upload: cross-env VITE_ACTIVE_ROUTE=upload INPUT=upload.html vite build --outDir dist/upload
scripts.build:history: cross-env VITE_ACTIVE_ROUTE=history INPUT=history.html vite build --outDir dist/history
scripts.build:glossary: cross-env VITE_ACTIVE_ROUTE=glossary INPUT=glossary.html vite build --outDir dist/glossary
scripts.watch:upload: cross-env VITE_ACTIVE_ROUTE=upload INPUT=upload.html vite build --watch --outDir dist/upload
scripts.watch:history: cross-env VITE_ACTIVE_ROUTE=history INPUT=history.html vite build --watch --outDir dist/history
scripts.watch:glossary: cross-env VITE_ACTIVE_ROUTE=glossary INPUT=glossary.html vite build --watch --outDir dist/glossary
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build:all && npm run serve
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently 'npm run watch:upload' 'npm run watch:history' 'npm run watch:glossary' 'npm run serve'
